blog

pola schwöbel




I am a PhD student in machine learning at the Technical University of Denmark, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science. I am part of the Section for Cognitive Systems, my advisor is Søren Hauberg. I am interested in Bayesian methods, invariance learning and algorithmic fairness.

    November 1, 2021 — 18:11
